options.name: High Tolerance
options.description: You can handle pain much easier than others. Increase your pain threshold by 1. While you are in moderate pain, you do not suffer a penalty dice to your rolls.

options.name: Caustic Endurance
options.description: You train your body against the worst toxins and poisons. Gain +1 skill with endurance and +1 toxic mitigation.

options.name: Embrace the Pain
options.description: Pain becomes momentum. While you are in moderate pain, roll an additional bonus die on all skill checks and weapon attacks.

options.name: Buffered Agony
options.description: Increase your maximum morale by 2. When you complete a full rest, gain +1 morale for every non-cosmetic physical injury.

options.name: Tempered Cortex
options.description: Gain +1 skill with resilience. While you are in moderate stress, you do not suffer a penalty dice to your rolls.
